name: Your "Save The Last Dance" Knowledge : 1 Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Did Sara take Derek out to celebrate his acceptance to Georgetown University?
questions.explanation:
False.

	Derek took Sara to the ballet to celebrate his acceptance to Georgetown University, but when they first arrived at the Chicago Theater Sara does not want to go in.

questions.text: What was the name of Sara, Derek, and Snookie's English teacher?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Campbell

	Mr. Campbell was played by Tab Baker, who also stared in the 1992 movie "Gladiator".

questions.text: Who said this line: "I ain't walking on eggshells, just because you brought the Brady Bunch to the negro club!"
questions.explanation:
Nikki.

	Nikki does not like Sara very much, because she knows that there is something going on with her and Derek, and she doesn't like it.

questions.text: What color jersey did Sara have on at the basketball game, in gym class?
questions.explanation:
Yellow.

	Nikki was on Sara's team. During the game, Sara accidentally hit Nikki with the basketball and Nikki didn't take it well, and they began to fight.

questions.text: Who said this line: "That's oil, you're milk, ain't no point tryin' to mix."
questions.explanation:
Malakai.

	That night at Steps, Sara and Derek were showing off their new dance move while Nikki decides to "cut-in", Sara was really offended by this so she just left the dance floor.

questions.text: Who said this line: "Snook, you talk a lot of stuff for someone who never says anything!"
questions.explanation:
Sara.

	Snookie was talking a lot of trash to Sara, so she replied back to him with this funny remark showing him and everyone else that she was not about to be walked on and she could last in that new enviroment.

questions.text: How old was Sara when she got caught stealing a hat?
questions.explanation:
12.

	When Sara was 12 she stole a hat, but her mother found it and made her give it back.

questions.text: Sara gave Snookie $20 to go out with him?
questions.explanation:
False.

	Chenille invited Sara to Steps, but Sara didn't have any I.D. so she had to pay Snookie $20 to have an I.D. made, to get into the club.

questions.text: How did Derek answer this question: "Now I'm cool?"
questions.explanation:
"You're almost there."

	Derek was teaching Sara how to sit, talk, walk, and dance in their school's cafeteria.

questions.text: What has Derek stolen before, because he didn't have one?
questions.explanation:
Bike.

	Derek tells Sara that he has stolen a bike before because he didn't have one.
